about_the_game:
Mika will have to work for the local delivery company and lend a hand to her new neighbors. Each new broom will have better features that will allow Mika to get a little closer to the top of the mountain, meet new characters, and discover new places.

If you complete deliveries successfully, without getting the package wet or breaking it, you will make your neighbors very happy and fill up your delivery person's card with green/orange/red stamps.

Take your magic broom and discover all the secrets hidden in the mountain while getting to know its charming inhabitants. Work hard and get a magic broom good enough to achieve your goal: to go to the top of the mountain.

Game features:
Fly over a beautiful island. Explore a mini open world full of secrets and magic.
Protect the packages from the elements as you fly around the island.
Play as a little witch who works delivering packages on a small island.
Be one with water and wind. Let yourself be carried by its vibrant and colorful landscapes.
A cozy light-heart story for you to unwind and relax.

short_description: Mika and the Witch’s Mountain is a fantasy adventure about an aspiring witch who delivers packages to the townspeople of a small island. Explore every cranny and soar through the sky with your magic broom.
